author: kfogel
msg: Fix bug whereby 'svn status --depth=files' still showed some directories.
See thread starting here for more:
(get_dir_status): Check depth before sending unversioned or external
directory.  Also, fix a wrong-pool buglet.  Add comments about how
external and unversioned got lumped together, and how this may not
have been intentional.  Lose some unnecessary comments.

author: stsp
msg: some regression tests just pointed out a really stupid
programming error on my part. Shame on me.
Also sprinkle two other small improvements.
(main): Don't use svn_opt_args_to_target_array3 to get URLs
supplied on the command line. That way lies madness, because
that function modifies its arguments in multiple ways. The
interface clearly isn't intended for what we are trying to do here,
and using it here actually breaks code further down the path.
Instead, copy arguments that look like URLs into a separate
array, and use that. This makes 3 regression tests pass again,
and gets rid of a huge chunk of needlessly complicated code.
Also, start using SVN_INT_ERR for new code instead of the inline
